title: [Lung cancer - what general practicioners should know].
summary: Lung cancer is one of the most common and deadliest forms of cancer worldwide. General practitioners play a crucial role in early detection, monitoring and coordination of treatment. ...
abstract: Lung cancer is one of the most common and deadliest forms of cancer worldwide. General practitioners play a crucial role in early detection, monitoring and coordination of treatment. Comprehensive knowledge of risk factors, symptoms, diagnostics, treatment options and palliative care is therefore essential.
